Docs.returns: The unique ID of the album just created.
Docs.remarks: If you attemp to create an album with a title that already exists, the new album will be created but it will have a different unique ID.

Docs.summary: Number of bytes used by all of the user's albums.

This is the main class for managing a Picasaweb gallery.
